name: @electricui/device-xbox-one-controller
description: ElectricUI Xbox One Device for Desktop
author: Electric UI <support@electricui.com> (https://electricui.com)

scripts.test: export TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs"}' &&  mocha --require ts-node/register --reporter mochawesome "test/**/*.ts" && export TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS=""
scripts.coverage: export TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs"}' && nyc mocha- -require ts-node/register "test/**/*.ts" && export TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS=""
